white.text:
The early signs
of simulation
sickness.

Putting your Vive
wand through
a $5000 TV.

A ball of earwax, 
semen, 
and 
toenail clippings.

Pushing someone
down a flight
of stairs.
white.creator: GrumpyCrouton

white.text:
A man on the 
brink of orgasm.

Lighting a homeless
person's cardboard
box on fire.
white.creator: GrumpyCrouton

white.text:
Putting a can of
Dr Pepper© in your
anus and whispering
"Dr Shipman is in."
white.creator: GrumpyCrouton

white.text:
A dagger made out
of a toothbrush.
white.creator: GrumpyCrouton

white.text:
Having a blind
person call you
ugly.

Seeing your mother
in the porn
you're watching.

The soft, warm,
silky interior of
an unwilling sheep.

Dark and
mysterious forces
beyond our control.

Shut up and
take my money!

Holding down a
child and farting
all over him.

Inserting a
Pineapple into
my anus (sideways).

A sci-fi movie full
of supermodels.

The race to beat
your vibrator's
dying batteries
to the finish line.

The terror when
you glimpse those
tiny droplets of pee
glistening on the
public toilet seat.

A full body cast
made of cocaine.
white.creator: Josh

chin.
